Hardware & Wedge Replacement

Supply and fit handles, locks, restrictors, safety stays and rubber wedges/seals for single and double-glazed aluminium windows and doors across Wellington, Porirua, Lower Hutt, Upper Hutt, Petone and Kāpiti.

Common parts we replace

Where we work

Wellington, Porirua, Lower Hutt, Upper Hutt, Petone and Kāpiti.

Related: Window repairs • Security stays

Hardware & wedges FAQs

  • Do you match finishes for existing joinery?
    Yes. We carry common finishes and source compatible handles, locks and wedges to suit your aluminium frames.
  • Can you supply safety stays and restrictors?
    Yes. We fit safety stays/restrictors along with locks and wedges to improve security and sealing.
